title: Simulation/VR-Based Advanced Social Domain Instructional Design Model Improvement Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of foundational instructional design theories and expertise in social sciences
context.additional_context: Advanced social studies specialization course for office/administrative professionals, conducted in BYOD environments with a focus on formative assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze limitations of existing instructional design models and propose at least three improvement directions.
Learners can design a customized instructional model applicable to VR simulation environments.
Learners can develop assessment rubrics reflecting advanced expertise in social studies with at least 80% accuracy.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
